Privacy Policy

Last updated: January 1, 2025

Introduction

SERP Downloaders ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our website and download tools.

Information We Collect

Information You Provide

  • URLs you submit for downloading
  • Contact information if you reach out to us
  • Feedback and suggestions you provide

Automatically Collected Information

  • Browser type and version
  • Operating system
  • IP address (anonymized)
  • Pages visited and time spent on site
  • Referring website information

How We Use Your Information

  • To provide our download services
  • To improve our website and tools
  • To respond to your inquiries
  • To analyze usage patterns and optimize performance
  • To prevent abuse and ensure security

Data Storage and Security

We do not store downloaded files on our servers. URLs submitted for downloading are processed in real-time and are not permanently stored. We implement appropriate security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information.

Third-Party Services

We may use third-party analytics services to understand how our website is used. These services may collect information about your use of our site. We ensure that any third-party services we use comply with privacy standards.

Cookies and Tracking

We use minimal cookies necessary for website functionality. We do not use cookies for advertising or tracking purposes. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Request information about data we collect
  • Request correction of inaccurate information
  • Request deletion of your information
  • Opt out of communications

Children's Privacy

Our services are not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

  • Email: privacy@serpdownloaders.com
  • Contact Form: Contact Page
